simlib.geometry.dihedral¶

simlib.geometry.dihedral(a, b, c, d)[source]¶

Compute dihedral angle between four points.

Parameters

b, c, d (a,) – Cartesian coordinates.

Returns

Dihedral angle

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray
